cards.name: Delay
cards.description: You may set aside an Action card from your hand. At the start of your next turn, play it.

cards.name: Desperation
cards.description: Once per turn: You may gain a Curse. If you do, +1 Buy and +$2.

cards.name: Gamble
cards.description:
+1 Buy
Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Treasure or Action, you may play it. Otherwise, discard it.

cards.name: Pursue
cards.description:
+1 Buy
Name a card. Reveal the top 4 cards from your deck. Put the matches back and discard the rest.

cards.name: Ride
cards.description: Gain a Horse.

cards.name: Toil
cards.description:
+1 Buy
You may play an action card from your hand.

cards.name: Enhance
cards.description: You may trash a non-Victory card from your hand, to gain a card costing up to $2 more than it.

cards.name: March
cards.description:
Look through your discard pile.
You may play an Action card from it.

cards.name: Transport
cards.description: Choose one; Exile an Action card from the Supply; or put an Action card you have in Exile onto your deck.

cards.name: Banish
cards.description: Exile any number of cards with the same name from your hand.

cards.name: Bargain
cards.description:
Gain a non-Victory card costing up to $5.
Each other player gains a Horse.

cards.name: Invest
cards.description:
Exile an Action card from the Supply.
While it's in Exile, when another player gains or Invests in a copy of it, +2 Cards.

cards.name: Seize the Day
cards.description:
Once per game:
Take an extra turn after this one.

cards.name: Commerce
cards.description: Gain a gold per differently named card you've gained this turn.

cards.name: Demand
cards.description: Gain a Horse and a card costing up to $4, both onto your deck.

cards.name: Stampede
cards.description: If you have 5 or fewer cards in play, gain 5 Horses onto your deck.

cards.name: Reap
cards.description: Gain a Gold. Set it aside. If you do, at the start of your next turn, play it.

cards.name: Enclave
cards.description: Gain a Gold. Exile a Duchy from the Supply.

cards.name: Alliance
cards.description: Gain a Province, a Duchy, an Estate, a Gold, a Silver, and a Copper.

cards.name: Populate
cards.description: Gain one card from each Action Supply pile.

cards.name: Horse
cards.description:
+2 Cards
+1 Action
Return this to its pile.
(This is not in the Supply.)

cards.name: Black Cat
cards.description:
+2 Cards
If it isn't your turn, each other player gains a Curse.
----------
When another player gains a victory card, you may play this from your hand.

cards.name: Sleigh
cards.description:
Gain 2 Horses.
----------
When you gain a card, you may discard this, to put that card into your hand or onto your deck.

cards.name: Supplies
cards.description:
Worth $1
When you play this, gain a Horse onto your deck.

cards.name: Camel Train
cards.description:
Exile a non-Victory card from the Supply.
----------
When you gain this, Exile a Gold from the Supply.

cards.name: Goatherd
cards.description:
+1 Action
You may trash a card from your hand.
+1 Card per card the player to your right trashed on their last turn.

cards.name: Scrap
cards.description: Trash a card from your hand. Choose a different thing per $1 it costs: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Buy; +$1; gain a Silver; gain a Horse.

cards.name: Sheepdog
cards.description:
+2 Cards
----------
When you gain a card, you may play this from your hand.

cards.name: Snowy Village
cards.description:
+1 Card
+4 Actions
+1 Buy
Ignore any further +Actions you get this turn.

cards.name: Stockpile
cards.description:
$3
+1 Buy
When you play this, Exile it.

cards.name: Bounty Hunter
cards.description:
+1 Action
Exile a card from your hand. If you don't have a copy of it in Exile, +$3.

cards.name: Cardinal
cards.description:
+$2
Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of their deck, Exiles one costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest.

cards.name: Cavalry
cards.description:
Gain 2 Horses.
----------
When you gain this, +2 Cards, +1 Buy, and if it's your Buy Phase return to your Action phase.

cards.name: Groom
cards.description:
Gain a card costing up to $4. If it's an...
Action card, gain a Horse; Treasure card, gain a Silver; Victory card, +1 Card and +1 Action.

cards.name: Hostelry
cards.description:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
----------
When you gain this, you may discard any number of Treasures, revealed, to gain that many Horses.

cards.name: Village Green
cards.description:
Either now or at the start of your next turn, +1 Card and +2 Actions.
----------
When you discard this other than during Clean-up, you may play it.

cards.name: Barge
cards.description: Either now or at the start of your next turn, +3 Cards and +1 Buy.

cards.name: Coven
cards.description:
+1 Action
+$2
Each other player Exiles a Curse from the Supply. If they can't, they discard their Exiled Curses.

cards.name: Displace
cards.description: Exile a card from your hand. Gain a differently named card costing up to $2 more than it.

cards.name: Falconer
cards.description:
Gain a card to your hand costing less than this.
----------
When any player gains a card with 2 or more types (Action, Attack, etc.), you may play this from your hand.

cards.name: Gatekeeper
cards.description: At the start of your next turn, +$3. Until then, when another player gains an Action or Treasure card if they don't have an Exiled copy of it, they Exile it.

cards.name: Hunting Lodge
cards.description:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
You may discard your hand for +5 Cards.

cards.name: Kiln
cards.description:
+$2
The next time you play a card this turn, you may first gain a copy of it.

cards.name: Livery
cards.description:
+$3
This turn, when you gain a card costing $4 or more, gain a Horse.

cards.name: Mastermind
cards.description: At the start of your next turn, you may play an Action card from your hand three times.

cards.name: Paddock
cards.description:
+$2
Gain 2 Horses.
+1 Action per empty Supply pile.

cards.name: Sanctuary
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+1 Buy
You may Exile a card from your hand.

cards.name: Fisherman
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+$1
----------
During your turns, if your discard pile is empty, this costs $3 less.

cards.name: Destrier
cards.description:
+2 Cards
+1 Action
----------
During your turns, this costs $1 less per card you've gained this turn.

cards.name: Wayfarer
cards.description:
+3 Cards
You may gain a Silver.
----------
This has the same cost as the last other card gained this turn, if any.

cards.name: Animal Fair
cards.description:
+$4
+1 Buy per empty supply pile.
----------
Instead of paying this card's cost, you may trash an Action card from your hand.

cards.name: Way of the Butterfly
cards.description: You may return this to its pile to gain a card costing exactly $1 more than it.

cards.name: Way of the Camel
cards.description: Exile a Gold from the Supply.

cards.name: Way of the Chameleon
cards.description:
Follow this card's instructions;
each time that would give you +Cards this turn, you get +$ instead, and vice-versa.

cards.name: Way of the Frog
cards.description:
+1 Action
When you discard this from play this turn, put it onto your deck.

cards.name: Way of the Goat
cards.description: Trash a card from your hand.

cards.name: Way of the Horse
cards.description:
+2 Cards
+1 Action
Return this to its pile.

cards.name: Way of the Mole
cards.description:
+1 Action
Discard your hand. +3 Cards.

cards.name: Way of the Mouse
cards.description:
Play the set-aside card, leaving it here.
----------
Setup: Set aside an unused Action costing $2 or $3.

cards.name: Way of the Mule
cards.description:
+1 Action
+$1

cards.name: Way of the Otter
cards.description: +2 Cards

cards.name: Way of the Owl
cards.description: Draw until you have 6 cards in hand.

cards.name: Way of the Ox
cards.description: +2 Actions

cards.name: Way of the Pig
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action

cards.name: Way of the Rat
cards.description: You may discard a Treasure to gain a copy of this.

cards.name: Way of the Seal
cards.description:
+$1
This turn, when you gain a card, you may put it onto your deck.

cards.name: Way of the Squirrel
cards.description: +2 Cards at the end of this turn.

cards.name: Way of the Turtle
cards.description: Set this aside. If you did, play it at the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Way of the Worm
cards.description: Exile an Estate from the Supply.
